titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit registered vendors to administer claims for refund of diesel fuel taxes paid on fuel used in certain buses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/24/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit registered vendors to administer claims for refund of diesel fuel taxes paid on fuel used in intercity, local, or school buses.
